DOC.brief_summary: From November 2014 October 2015 , multi-centers retrospective study conduct collect compliance , 8 three-level hospital China include . The infant survive postmenstrual age 36 week birth weight less 1500g without congenital disease . The birth weight , gestational age , morbidity poor outcome ( death , cerebral palsy , cognitive , et al ) record . Data analyze Chi-square test observe relationship morbidity poor outcome . And predictive effect number top three morbidity analyze Logistic regression analysis .
DOC.brief_title: To Research Relation Between Neonatal Morbidities Poor Outcome Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: From November 2014 October 2015 , multicenters retrospective study conduct collect compliance , 8 threelevel hospital China include . The infant survive postmenstrual age 36 week birth weight less 1500g . The low birth weight infant n't congenital disease .
